item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: Trinity Brewhouse on Fountain Street

Unfortunately and to my dismay, it seems that 3 Steeple Street is closed and so we venture to another, equally historic venue instead. I know many of you have been here before, but hey, when its a good thing, its a good thing, and Trinity always delivers! Plus we haven't had a Monday Night Meetup here since the Collective beginnings in '08:

A Rhode Island institution - need we say more. If you've been, you know. If you haven't, you'll find out. After all they "Sell Heaven By The Pint". The food isn't bad either.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: This is a big place, I'll break out the blue fuzzy scarf and hopefully you'll find us! Look for us at the right side of the bar.
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - Trinity Brewhouse! (3 Steeple Street is closed)
